block.p: WORLD WRESTLING FEDERATION ENTERTAINMENT INC., -- Stamford, Conn., said it intended to list its common shares on the New York Stock Exchange on Oct. 25 under the symbol WWF. The company's shares were first quoted on the Nasdaq stock market after it completed its public offering on Oct. 19, 1999.

1-800-FLOWERS.COM INC., -- Westbury, N.Y., which sells flowers and gifts via telephone and the Web, said it signed a new five-year marketing agreement with America Online, the Internet services company, extending an existing e-commerce partnership.
